name: project-geeenesis
description: A NTU EEE project to improve freshman transition into University life | Prawira Genestonlia | All rights reserved

scripts.start: npm run start-client-admins & npm run start-client-mentors & npm run start-client-students & npm run server
scripts.build: npm run build-client-admins && npm run build-client-mentors && npm run build-client-students
scripts.install: npm run install-client-admins && npm run install-client-mentors && npm run install-client-students && npm run install-server
scripts.git-fast-sync: git add . && git commit -m "Fast Sync" && git push origin master

author: Prawira Genestonlia
